prompts: Create an Electric-type Pokemon that has sleek fur and a playful demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon with a canine appearance and striking yellow and gray colors.
Imagine a fast-moving Pokemon that resembles a dog, perfect for urban environments.
Design a Pokemon that embodies loyalty and energy, with vibrant colors and distinct features.
Generate a Pokemon that thrives in grassy areas, with a unique electric charge in its fur.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sleek, quadruped form and a bright, friendly expression.
Make a Pokemon that has a playful personality and strikes a balance between strength and speed.
